ActorFrame.W1Command: %function(self) LzCheckMetalClassicTaro = self:GetZ(); if LzCheckMetalClassicTaro > 0 then if GAMESTATE:IsPlayerEnabled(PLAYER_1) then MESSAGEMAN:Broadcast('W1P1Left'); MESSAGEMAN:Broadcast('W1P1'); else MESSAGEMAN:Broadcast('W1P2Left'); MESSAGEMAN:Broadcast('W1P2'); end else MESSAGEMAN:Broadcast('W1P2Left'); MESSAGEMAN:Broadcast('W1P2'); end end
ActorFrame.W2Command: %function(self) LzCheckMetalClassicTaro = self:GetZ(); if LzCheckMetalClassicTaro > 0 then if GAMESTATE:IsPlayerEnabled(PLAYER_1) then MESSAGEMAN:Broadcast('W2P1Left'); MESSAGEMAN:Broadcast('W2P1'); else MESSAGEMAN:Broadcast('W2P2Left'); MESSAGEMAN:Broadcast('W2P2'); end else MESSAGEMAN:Broadcast('W2P2Left'); MESSAGEMAN:Broadcast('W2P2'); end end

ActorFrame.W6Command: %function(self) LzCheckMetalClassicTaro = self:GetZ(); if LzCheckMetalClassicTaro > 0 then if GAMESTATE:IsPlayerEnabled(PLAYER_1) then MESSAGEMAN:Broadcast('MissP1Left'); MESSAGEMAN:Broadcast('MissP1'); else MESSAGEMAN:Broadcast('MissP2Left'); MESSAGEMAN:Broadcast('MissP2'); end else MESSAGEMAN:Broadcast('MissP2Left'); MESSAGEMAN:Broadcast('MissP2'); end end

ActorFrame.InitCommand: %function(self) receptor_x_0_4 = 0 receptor_y_0_4 = 0 receptor_z_0_4 = 0 receptor_rotationx_0_4 = 0 receptor_rotationy_0_4 = 0 receptor_rotationz_0_4 = 0 receptor_zoomx_0_4 = 1 receptor_zoomy_0_4 = 1 receptor_zoomz_0_4 = 1 receptor_fadetop_0_4 = 0 receptor_fadebottom_0_4 = 0 receptor_fadeleft_0_4 = 0 receptor_faderight_0_4 = 0 receptor_croptop_0_4 = 0 receptor_cropbottom_0_4 = 0 receptor_cropleft_0_4 = 0 receptor_cropright_0_4 = 0 self:sleep(0); self:queuecommand('Update') end
ActorFrame.UpdateCommand: %function(self) self:x(receptor_x_0_4) self:y(receptor_y_0_4) self:z(receptor_z_0_4) self:rotationx(receptor_rotationx_0_4) self:rotationy(receptor_rotationy_0_4) self:rotationz(receptor_rotationz_0_4) self:zoomx(receptor_zoomx_0_4) self:zoomy(receptor_zoomy_0_4) self:zoomz(receptor_zoomz_0_4) self:fadetop(receptor_fadetop_0_4) self:fadebottom(receptor_fadebottom_0_4) self:fadeleft(receptor_fadeleft_0_4) self:faderight(receptor_faderight_0_4) self:croptop(receptor_croptop_0_4) self:cropbottom(receptor_cropbottom_0_4) self:cropleft(receptor_cropleft_0_4) self:cropright(receptor_cropright_0_4) self:sleep(0.05); self:queuecommand('Update') end
